items.name: Trump
items.subject: Notice of Termination
items.body:
You're Fired!

I am writing to inform you that after careful consideration and evaluation of your performance, we have decided to terminate your employment with immediate effect.

It is with regret that we have reached this decision, but we believe it is in the best interest of the organization. We appreciate your contributions during your time here, but unfortunately, we have identified certain areas where your performance did not meet our expectations.

Please arrange a meeting with the HR department to discuss the details of your departure, including the necessary paperwork and the return of any company property in your possession.

Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,

Donald J. Trump

items.subject: Job Openings at Yamazaki
items.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

My name is John Smith. I am a student at The University Of Aizu. I am writing to express my interest in potential job opportunities at Yamazaki. I am eager to join your esteemed team and contribute to the success of your store.

I would appreciate it if you could kindly provide information regarding any current job openings at Yamazaki. Additionally, if there is an application process or any specific qualifications or requirements, please let me know.

I am available for an interview at your convenience and can provide any necessary documentation or references upon request. I am confident that my skills and enthusiasm would make me a valuable asset to your team.

John Smith
